project_abstract.cdata: Specific development objectives of the Investment Recovery Project are to: (i) provide stimulus to private sector development through the financing of new investments in private or newly privatized enterprises in need of fresh capital for expansion or restructuring; (ii) support the Government's objective of promoting competition in the financial system by helping strengthen the institutional capacity of participating commercial banks (PCBs); and (iii) foster  development of a market of medium and long-term financing of investment projects.  The project's component will be a line of credit to PCBs to be on-lent to private sector enterprises.  These sub-loans may be used to finance capital investments and may include up to a 20 percent component of associated working capital.
